altTitles.ja: ケントゥリア

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

title.en: Conquering the Academy with Just a Sashimi Knife.

altTitles.en: I Took Over the Academy With a Single Sashimi Knife
Chewed Up the Academy With a Bag of Sashimi
Chew the Academy With a Sashimi Stick

description.en:
"If I slash, it will be cut."

I, who was once called the best swordsman in the nation, have ended up in a mobile game I've only spent money on a few times. And I’ve even received the blessing of the 'Sword God'!

But… the only weapon I can use is a sashimi knife?

Just one minute a day. I become a Sword Saint with a sashimi knife.

title.en: Class no Daikirai na Joshi to Kekkon Suru Koto ni Natta

altTitles.ja: クラスの大嫌いな女子と結婚することになった。

altTitles.en: I Got Married to the Girl I Hate Most in Class

altTitles.zh-hk: 我要和班裡我最討厭的妹子結婚了。

altTitles.ja: Kurasu no daikirai na joshi to kekkon suru koto ni natta.

description.en:
High school student Hojo Saito married his classmate, Sakuramori Akane, the girl who’s his worst enemy in school.

“If you tell the rest of the class we’re married, I’ll kill you”

“I don’t want them to know either. There’s no point in that.”

Their newlywed life wasn’t going so well, and they were constantly at odds. However, as they progress through their daily lives, the distance between them closes, they have more enjoyable moments together, and they gradually come to understand one another.

Saito learns about Akane’s cute side, which he never saw before, and Akane gradually began to recognize the feelings that she’s been keeping inside…

The heart-throbbing newlywed life of two people who just can’t seem to be honest with each other begins here!
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio Hojo Saito se casou com sua colega de classe, Sakuramori Akane, a garota que é seu pior inimigo na escola. 

“Se você contar ao resto da turma que somos casados, eu mato você” 

“Eu também não quero que eles saibam. Não há sentido nisso. ” 

A vida de recém-casados não estava indo muito bem e eles estavam constantemente em conflito. No entanto, à medida que avançam em suas vidas diárias, a distância entre eles diminui, eles passam momentos mais agradáveis juntos e, aos poucos, passam a se entender. Saito aprende sobre o lado fofo de Akane, que ele nunca tinha visto antes, e Akane gradualmente começou a reconhecer os sentimentos que ela estava guardando… 

A vida de recém-casado comovente de duas pessoas que simplesmente não conseguem ser honestas uma com a outra começa aqui!

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

altTitles.ja: 渋谷第6屍防衛隊

description.en: One day, the world ended. Mysterious creatures appeared, turning modern Japan to ruins. As humanity hid underground to survive, an organization formed to protect them and reclaim the surface. Its name was:the "Undead Defense Unit."

altTitles.ja: 魔物の花嫁

description.en: Sumioka Hana has lived on her job without making her lover. One day when her overwork peaked, she fell off the platform of the station. When she noticed, she was transferred to the world of fairy tales she read when she was young. Hana, who was injured by herself, is saved by Flora, the main character of her picture book. She was, however, caught by her brother Nicholas, and she was sacrificed to a human-eating monster. When I thought she was sucked by a man who was a vampire, she suddenly got hot in her body ...?

title.en: I Adopted the Male Lead from the Shelter

altTitles.en: I Adopted the Male Lead from the Prisoner Shelter
I Adopted a Male Lead From a Prison Shelter
Adopted a Male Lead From a Prisoner Shelter

altTitles.ja: 捨てられた主人公を引き取りました

altTitles.th: เสือดาวกร้าวใจ

description.en:
In a universe ripped from the pages of a story, Siena Robert, a self-aware villainess, strives to rewrite her fate. Daughter of a man running a therianthrope shelter, she discovers Ivan Levdilin, the captivating male lead, detained within. Aware of her scripted demise when Ivan's father arrives for his rescue, Siena defies her villainous destiny. She showers Ivan with kindness, a stark contrast to the original Siena's cruel persona. Her actions shield Ivan from her father's cruelty and forge an unscripted bond between them that changes their destiny in an unforeseen direction. 

---
She possessed Sienna Lovett, the villain of the tragic novel. The greatest leader of the Tigers in the original novel when his Tiger Clan abandoned him for being a mutant, but that didn’t last long before the Duke came looking for his son. I’ve convinced my father to let him live with us somehow, but now I just need to succeed in protecting Ivan until the Duke comes… But when the Duke arrives, the unexpected happens. “I’ll take she too.” huh? I? Do I really want to continue living with my father?

altTitles.ja: スキップとローファー

description.en:
Iwakura Mitsumi always had big dreams, of leaving her small town, advancing to a top tier university, and then contributing to the country before retiring back to her home town. So focused is she on her goal that she is oblivious to all the other ways she comes up short, much to the chagrin and concern of her friends and family. Can a naive country girl make it in Tokyo?  
  
Nominated for the 2020 Manga Taisho Award, came in third behind the winner Blue Period and second place, Spy x Family.

Because of her personality, highschooler Xu Ting is often picked on by her classmates. Until one day, the school’s young, new maintenance worker saves her.  His attractive looks and mysterious aura enthrall the bullies.  Xu Ting feels indebted, yet in the small forest after school, she accidentally discovers his deepest secret?!

title.en: Soshite Boku wa Koi wo Shiru

altTitles.ja: そうして僕は恋を知る

description.en: After losing his life as a soccer player to an accident, Hinata Shogo works at a patisserie run by his benefactor and long-time crush, Hanagiri Akira. Unable to convey his feelings, he thinks that being by the side of calm and gentle Akira is enough – until one day, he witnesses Akira fighting on the streets in the middle of the night like a completely different person. After his true character is revealed, Akira attempts to avoid Shogo. “I want to know the things I don’t know about you!” “I don’t want things to remain the same!” With these revelations, Shogo pushes Akira down…?! “What should I do, Akira-san? I want to make love to you no matter what.” A story about a determined love, featuring a hot-blooded, pure-hearted young man X ex-gangster patissier. Includes an extra chapter showcasing Akira’s gap-moe*!!

Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

altTitles.ja: からかい上手(?)の西片さん

altTitles.tl: Ang Magaling sa Panunuksong (?) si Nishikata-san

description.en: In this spinoff of "Teasing Master Takagi-san", and continuation of "Teasing Master (former) Takagi-san", Chi Nishikata tries her hardest to tease her classmate Ooshiro, but for some reason it feels like she's met him somewhere. Can she finally get one over on him and remember her past?
description.fr: Dans ce spin-off de « Quand Takagi me taquine “, et suite de ” Quand Takagi me taquinait », Chi Nishikata fait de son mieux pour taquiner son camarade de classe Ooshiro, mais elle a l'impression de l'avoir déjà rencontré quelque part. Parviendra-t-elle enfin à prendre le dessus sur lui et à se souvenir du passé ?
description.tl: Si Chi, ang minamahal na anak ng (dating) Takagi at Nishikata. Ngayon ay nasa high school na kasama ang batang lalaki sa tabi, kaya ba n'yang tuksuhin s'ya tulad ng kanyang ina?! O s'ya ba ang matutukso tulad ng kanyang ama!? Ang mga araw na puno ng pang-aasar ay magsisimula na muli— !
description.uk: Це спін-офф манг "Майстер дражнилок Такаґі-сан" та "Майстер дражнилок(колишня) Такаґі-сан". Донька головних героїв Чі іде до школи і зустрічає друга дитинства. Як складуться їх відносини і чи зможе вона подражнити хлопця?
description.pt-br: Neste spin-off de "Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san" e continuação de "Karakai Jouzu no (Moto) Takagi-san", Nishikata Chi se esforça ao máximo para provocar seu colega de classe Ooshiro, mas por algum motivo parece que ela o conhece de algum lugar. Ela pode finalmente superá-lo e lembrar de seu passado?

title.en: Legend of the Galactic Heroes (MICHIHARA Katsumi)

altTitles.ja: 銀河英雄伝説

description.en:
Manga adaptation of 1980s.  
  
Five hundred years ago, Rudolf von Goldenbaum united the disparate governments of humankind and established a mighty human empire, a tribute to his own greatness that stretched across the galaxy. Demanding loyalty and discipline, Rudolf created an order designed to long outlast his own rule; but all human works fade in time. Today, the decaying empire faces the threat of the Free Planets Alliance, and military leaders on both sides jockey for power in the face of a seemingly inevitable conflict. On the side of the empire, the young general Reinhard von Lohengramm sees war as opportunity, and the empire as soft clay ready for his own sculpting. On the side of the alliance, would-be historian Yang Wen-li would like nothing better than to live out his days in peace - but times of war have little use for men who waste their days studying the mistakes of the past. Circumstances will make heroes and villains of both these men, as they write new history one blood-splattered page at a time.  
  


---
description.ru:
История человечества всегда была историей войн, во все времена, во все эпохи. И во все эпохи находятся люди, оставляющие след в истории, чьи имена выжжены на её скрижалях. Этих людей называют героями.  
В третьем тысячелетии, когда люди давно переселились с Земли на просторы Галактики, между абсолютной монархией Галактический Рейх и республикой Союз Свободных Планет уже 150 лет продолжается война. И на озарённом пламенем войны небосклоне зажигаются звёзды героев, судьба которых - изменить мир.

altTitles.ja: ガチアクタ

description.en:
A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.

---
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (U.S. Only)
description.fa:
در اطـــــــراف حلبی‌آباد  پرتـگاهی وجـو د دارد که هرکـس مرتکب
خلافی شود به آنجا پـــــرت می‌شــود. رودو یتــیمی است که   در 
آنجا زندگی میکند اما روزی  به‌خاطر یک پاپوش او را به اشــــــــد
مجازات محکوم می‌کنند.
description.id:
Di daerah kumuh dimana keturunan kriminal tinggal... orang-orang yang di luar perbatasan mendiskriminasi dan merendahkan mereka sebagai "orang suku.". rudo, anak yatim, yang tinggal di daerah kumuh dengan orang tua angkatnya, regto, dan bertahan hidup menggunakan kemampuan fisik hebatnya. bagaimanapun, suatu hari, dia dituduh melakukan kejahatan yang dia tidak lakukan, dan dilempar ke dalam "abyss" yang bahkan orang-orang di daerah kumu bahkan ditakuti.'
Tinggal di daerah kumuh dari kota makmur, Rudo dan ayah angkatnya regto mencoba untuk bersahabat dengan orang-orang kota, tapi rudo membenci borosnya orang kelas atas. mengabaikan peringatan dari sekitarnya, Rudo mengais sampah melalui tempat pembuangan kota untuk mencari barang-barang bernilai atau berguna untuk diselamatkan dari "abyss"- lubang besar dimana apapun yang dianggap sampah dibuang ke sana, termasuk manusia. Ayah kandung Rudo termasuk orang itu, yang dilempar ke dalalm Abys setelah dia difitnah melakukan pembunuhan.
Suatu hari, setelah lari dari sesosok misterius saat jalan pulang, Rudo menemukan tubuh sekarat Regto terbaring di lantai. dia dengan segera ditemukan di tkp oleh petugas dan dijatuhi dengan pembunuhan. Tidak seorangpun percaya ketidak bersalahannya, dan dia dilempar ke Abyss. Alih-alih mati, dia menemukan dirinya di tempat aneh, dan berbau busuk yang dikelilingi oleh monster yang terbuat dari sampah.
Ketika rudo diserang oleh monster itu, dia diselamatkan oleh pria yang bernama enjin, yang menyebut dirinya sebagai "janitor"- seseorang yang menggunakan senjata spesial yang disebut "jinki" untuk melawan makhluk itu. Agar dapat balas dendam pada orang yang membunuh Regto, Rudo dengan enggan menjadi seorang janitor untuk dapat kembali ke atas dan keluar dari Abyss.
description.ja: 犯罪者の子孫たちが暮らすスラム街。境界線の向こうの人々からは「族民」とさげすまれ、差別を受けていた。孤児だった少年・ルドは、育ての親であるレグトと共にスラム街に住み、常人離れした身体能力を武器に生計を立てていた。だがある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、スラムの人々でさえ恐れる「奈落」へと落とされてしまう……。
description.es-la:
Barrios marginales habitados por descendientes de delincuentes. La gente de fuera de la frontera los desprecia y discrimina como "gente de la tribu". Ludo, un niño huérfano, vive en el barrio bajo con su padre adoptivo Legto, y se gana la vida utilizando sus extraordinarias habilidades físicas. Sin embargo, un día es acusado de un crimen que no cometió y se ve abocado al "abismo" que hasta los habitantes de los barrios bajos temen.

(Source: Pocket Magazine)
description.pt-br: O grito redundante da alma que vem do fundo do poço em direção ao mundo infestado pelo desprezo e segregação! O subúrbio onde vivem os descendentes dos criminosos. Mesmo assim o Ludo vivia em meio à esse ambiente, de cabeça erguida, mas......!?

altTitles.ja: ダメ人間の愛しかた

altTitles.en: How to Love a Useless Person

altTitles.vi: Bí Quyết Để Yêu Một Tên Vô Dụng

description.en:
"No talent, no money, no education. A worthless person, bottom of the barrel."
"But... just seeing you like that makes me feel so happy."
Shinba, an unemployed young man, is what someone could call a useless person.
For some reason, such a man is dating a cool and beautiful woman named Hizumi.

For the sake of Hizumi, whom he loves very much, Shinba tries to graduate from being a useless person, but his efforts are always in vain.

She ridicule, sneers and deny him. She whisper words of love to him and stays by his side.

An imbalanced love story, presented by a useless man and a devilish girlfriend, open its curtains to the world.
description.pt-br:
"Sem talento, sem dinheiro, sem educação. Uma pessoa sem valor, no fundo do poço."
"Mas... só de te ver assim me faz tão feliz."
Shinba, um jovem desempregado, é o que alguém poderia chamar de uma pessoa inútil.
Por algum motivo, esse homem está namorando uma mulher legal e bonita chamada Hizumi.

Pelo bem de Hizumi, a quem ele ama muito, Shinba tenta se formar como uma pessoa útil, mas seus esforços são sempre em vão.

Ela ridiculariza, zomba e o nega. Sussurra palavras de amor para ele e fica ao seu lado.

Uma história de amor desequilibrada, apresentada por um homem inútil e uma namorada diabólica, abre suas cortinas para o mundo.

altTitles.vi: Nhất quỷ nhì ma, thứ ba Takagi

altTitles.ja: からかい上手の高木さん

altTitles.es: La Maestra de las Bromas: Takagi - San

altTitles.th: แกล้งนัก รักนะ รู้ยัง?

altTitles.tl: Ang Magaling sa Panunuksong si Takagi-san

description.en:
*If you blush, you lose!*  Living by this principle, the middle schooler Nishikata gets constantly made fun of by his seat neighbour Takagi-san. With his pride shattered to pieces, he vows to turn the tables and get back at her someday.   And so, he attempts to tease her day after day, only to find himself falling victim to Takagi-san's ridicule again sooner than later. Will he be able to make Takagi-san blush from embarrassment even once in the end? English Chapters have been renumbered to their tank numbers, where applicable.*

---
- **Won the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**
description.id: Komik ini bercerita tentang seorang siswa Sekolah Menengah Nishikata dan Takagi duduk bersebelahan di kelas. Takagi menikmati menggoda Nishikata dengan lelucon dan lelucon yang memalukan. Sebagai tanggapan, Nishikata membuat rencana untuk membalas dendam, tetapi dia gagal ketika dia mengidentifikasi kelemahannya dan memanfaatkannya. Dalam beberapa kasus langka di mana Takagi kehilangan tantangan, Nishikata tidak merasa seperti dia benar-benar menang. Pengaturan ini didasarkan pada kota Tonoshou di Prefektur Kagawa.
description.zh:
“脸红，你就输了！”
	
「今天一定要捉弄高木同学，让她害羞！」
某所中学，在各种方面都被邻座的女生高木同学捉弄的男生西片。
他为了对此反击而每天奋斗，但……？
这样的高木同学与西片带来的
全力「捉弄」青春大战开始了！
description.pt-br: Takagi-san, essa é a garota que se senta ao meu lado, sempre me provocando. Mas você vai ver, hoje é o dia que eu vou dar o troco e envergonhá-la!!

altTitles.ja: アオアシ

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

title.en: Keikenzumi na Kimi to, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Otsukiai Suru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 経験済みなキミと、 経験ゼロなオレが、 お付き合いする話

altTitles.ja-ro: Keiken Zumi na Kimi to, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Otsukiai Suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: You Were Experienced, I Was Not: Our Dating Story

altTitles.th: หนุ่มซิงกับสาวฮอต เดตนี้จะรอดมั้ยนะ

altTitles.ru: История знакомства опытной тебя и неопытного меня

altTitles.en: Our Dating Story: The Experienced You and the Inexperienced Me
A Story About You, Who Has Experience, And Me, Who Has Zero Experience, Dating

description.en:
Ryuuto Kashima is a gloomy high school student. Because of a punishment game, he was forced to confess to Runa Shirakawa, a girl from the top of school caste and admired by everyone. They ended up going out for the unexpected reason of "Err, I'm free now so..." but, Ryuuto ends up following and eavesdropping Runa getting confessed by a handsome soccer club member, and Runa bringing Ryuuto, whom she just started dating, to her own room as a matter of course. 

They have different friends and ways to have fun, different in just about everything. And yet, surprised by their differences everyday, accepting it, they begin to relate with each other.

___
**Character Designer:** [magako](https://mangadex.org/author/fd30d521-18ba-4638-94c3-700858ce7c43)
description.ja: スクールカースト最上位&憧れの美少女・月愛に罰ゲームきっかけで告白した、陰キャ気味の男子高校生・龍斗。返事はなんと、「今わたしフリーだし」という一言で即OK! こうして何もかも正反対の二人は、お付き合いすることになり…!?

altTitles.ja: 地獄の軍団

description.en:
A boy abandoned at birth and raised by rats, with the mysterious power to control them, grows up seeing 
the dark side of the humans that rejected him, and vows to become humanity's greatest enemy.

altTitles.ja: 双星の陰陽師

description.en:
Rokuro Enmado is from a family of exorcists who remove evil Kegare, but his real dream is to be a singer, a soccer player, or anything other than an exorcist. When another exorcist, a girl named Benio Adashino arrives, Rokura is suddenly inflamed with competitive spirit and decides to put his natural knack to good use. Their rivalry gets more complicated when they both learn they are the destined "Twin Star Exorcists," two ultimate fighters fated to marry and create the prophesied child who will eliminate all the Kegare in the world.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Twin Star Exorcists** (2019)
description.ru: С давних времён доблестные оммёдзи сражаются со скверной - злобными духами, рождёнными из человеческих страхов, боли и отчаяния. Рокуро с детства мечтал стать сильнейшим оммёдзи и очистить мир от скверны, но ужасная трагедия на долгие годы убила в нём всякое желание бороться. Но кому есть дело до желаний гиперактивного мальчишки, когда от него и талантливой девочки зависит судьба всего мира?
description.tr: Rokuro Enmado, kötü Kegare'yi ortadan kaldıran bir şeytan kovucu ailesindendir, ancak asıl hayali bir şarkıcı, futbolcu ya da şeytan kovucudan başka bir şey olmaktır. Benio Adashino adında başka bir şeytan çıkarıcı kız geldiğinde, Rokura aniden rekabetçi bir ruhla alevlenir ve doğal yeteneğini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. İkisi de kaderlerinde evlenip dünyadaki tüm Kegare'leri ortadan kaldıracak kehanet çocuğunu yaratmak olan iki nihai savaşçı, "İkiz Yıldız Şeytan Kovucu" olduklarını öğrendiklerinde rekabetleri daha da karmaşık bir hal alır.
description.pt-br: Rokuro sonha em se tornar tudo menos um exorcista! Então a misteriosa Benio aparece. Os dois são apelidados de "Exorcistas das Estrelas Gêmeas" e descobrem que estão destinados a se casar... Rokuro pode escapar de ambos os destinos? Quando o melhor amigo de Rokuro, Ryogo, desaparece, Rokuro é forçado a pedir ajuda a Benio para entrar em Magano, o reino dos Kegare, para resgatá-lo!

title.en: The Evil God Descends, I Own Great Hell

altTitles.zh: 邪神降世，我有一座大凶狱

description.en:
In the apocalypse, an evil god descends, devouring humans and threatening my homeland, China! Little do they know, I hold the control of the Demon-Suppressing Hell, where countless gods and ancient monsters from China have been secretly imprisoned for thousands of years! All for this moment... to annihilate the foreign gods and cleanse the human world!

— Of course, if you surrender, as the Warden, I might consider letting you evil gods into the Great Hell to work on sewing machines. Meals and accommodation are provided, of course.

altTitles.ja: 30MS AROUND!

description.en:
"30MS 4-panel comic begins!"
Enjoy the relaxed everyday life of the sisters ✨

Official 4Koma posted on the 30 Minutes Sisters Twitter: https://x.com/30msisters
Also available on the Bandai Hobby Site: https://bandai-hobby.net/site/30minutes_sisters/extra/around/

Is dying repeatedly a blessing? Enkrid's life-long dream of becoming a knight looked to be forever out of reach, until one day he died... and woke up at the beginning of that same day! Now that he has unlimited chances to train and engage in mortal combat, just how far can he go?

title.en: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden:  Kikuri Hiroi's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！外伝　廣井きくりの深酒日記

altTitles.en: Bocchi the Rock! Side Story: Hiroi Kikuri's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ru: Одинокий Рокер! Спин-офф: Дневник пьяницы Хирои Кикури

altTitles.vi: Bocchi the Rock! Ngoại Truyện: Nhật Ký Say Rượu của Hiroi Kikuri

altTitles.ja-ro: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden: Hiroi Kikuri no Fukazake Nikki

description.en: Kikuri Hiroi (25 years old). She is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK", and she loves alcohol. She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment of the live house, so she seems to be short of money. She lives in a 52-year-old apartment without a bath, and sometimes borrows showers from her friends and acquaintances. She is regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, which she counters with a "happiness spiral" with the help of alcohol. What is her daily life like...?!

altTitles.ja: ゴーストフィクサーズ

description.en: Following a certain event, Mikurigaoka New Town transformed into a crucible of supernatural phenomena known as GHOSTS! In said town lives Hifumi, a middle school boy, who one day encounters a girl who just moved in... Help "correct" the supernatural in this action-packed tale from Yasuki Tanaka, creator of "Summer Time Rendering"!

title.en: Tonari no Neko to Koi Shirazu

altTitles.ja: となりの猫と恋知らず

altTitles.en: The Feline Neighbor and the Unversed-in-Love

altTitles.ja: となねこ

description.en: Minato Seno, who has always been very shy since he was young, struggled to make friends during his first few days of high school. He also never got a glimpse of his classmate Nekozane-san's face, as she was always asleep at the desk next to him. However, one day after school, a chance encounter revealed a side of Nekozane-san that was completely different from the one Minato knew in the classroom.
description.ja:
**もっと知りたい きみのこと**
高校1年生・瀬野湊（せのみなと）。新学期早々に担任の教師から頼まれたのは、となりの席でいつも寝ている猫実（ねこざね）さんのこと。超人見知り&引っ込み思案な性格な瀬野…。会話どころか顔すら見たことがない猫実さんを勇気を出して起こそうとしたら、急に彼女から抱きつかれて――!?友達未満なふたりが紡ぐ、無自覚ラブコメ開幕♪

altTitles.ja: 中間管理録トネガワ

description.en: One day, executive Tonegawa Yukio was ordered by Hyoudou Kazutaka, the chairman of the Teiai Group, to plan a "game of death" for the debtors! What awaited Tonegawa, who immediately held a planning meeting, was suffering, agony, and despair! The diabolical spin-off, depicting Tonegawa's anguish between the chairman and the blacksuits, starts now!

altTitles.vi: Fairy Tail Nhiệm vụ Trăm năm

altTitles.th: แฟรี่เทล ภาคเควส 100 ปี ตอนที่

altTitles.ja: フェアリーテイル １００年クエスト

altTitles.zh-hk: 妖精的尾巴 百年任務

description.en:
After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.ru: Продолжение популярной манги "Хвост Феи" или "Фейри Тейл", которая будет носить отдельное название "100 летний квест"! После победы над Зерефом нашу любимую, еще более сильную гильдию, ждет новое приключение! Не пропустите новые приключения популярных героев!

title.en: Quick Transmigration: The Villain is Too Spoiled and Flirty

altTitles.zh-ro: Kuài Chuān: Fǎn Pài Tài Chǒng Tài Liāo Rén

altTitles.en: Quick to Wear: The Villain Is Too Spoiled and Too Provocative

description.en:
In order to be resurrected, Sheng Nuan needs to transmigrate into different worlds as a minor supporting female character and complete tasks to prevent the villains from turning evil. However... aren't these villains supposed to be cold-blooded and obsessive? Why are they all starting to say things like, 

"Nuan Nuan, you can't go anywhere except stay by my side..."

"Nuan Nuan, for you, I would destroy kingdoms without hesitation!"

"Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon."

Sheng Nuan: ???

altTitles.pt-br: Aulas de luta de primeira classe

description.en:
The bullied loser Kim Jaehyuk receives 'Top 1 Fighting Tutoring'!
Kim Jaehyuk is a high school student who has been living in despair under the torment of bullies. He's good at studying, but he'd rather be good at fighting.
Then, as if by fate, a 'fighting tutor' comes into his life!
description.pt-br: Kim Jaehyuk é um estudante do ensino médio que vive em desespero sob o tormento dos valentões. Ele é bom nos estudos, mas preferiria ser bom na luta. Então, o destino põe um "tutor de luta" em sua vida!

description.en:
When vlogger meets top-of-the-industry writer, what could go wrong? Everything! Nothing has gone my way ever since meeting her.

Hu Luoluo, on the brink of having her vlogger account relinquished, is shoved into the path of scandal-ridden writer extraordinaire Song Li purely by accident. Being featured on hot topics, paired up as a couple, finally gaining traffic... Will it finally make her the greatest vlogger of all time?
description.es-la: Juntos o se hunden juntos, ¿se descubrirán mentiras sobre el amor? Están ligados por negocios, fingiendo ser pareja para contrarrestar los escándalos del escritor y lograr ser el primer lugar en el buscador.

title.en: I Fell Into a Reverse Harem Game!

altTitles.ko-ro: Yeok Harem Game Sogeuro Tteoreojin Moyangimnida

altTitles.en: It Looks Like I've Fallen into the World of a Reverse Harem Game
It Seems Like I Fell Into a Reverse Harem Game

altTitles.fr: Je suis tombée dans un jeu de harem inversé!

altTitles.pt-br: Estou dentro de um jogo de harém inverso

altTitles.uk: Здається я потрапила в світ гри гаремника

altTitles.ja: 逆ハーレムゲームの中に落ちたようです

altTitles.ja-ro: Gyaku Harem Game no Naka ni Ochitayou desu

altTitles.th: เมื่อฉันกลายเป็นตัวร้ายในเกมจีบหนุ่ม

description.en:
Reset, and game set.

When I opened my eyes, I was in a different world. I had become the game's villainous princess who was feared by all. Not to mention… Completely naked men I didn't even know were approaching me left and right!

“Are you cold? Shall I warm you up with a hug?”

“Oh? Have you not had enough yet?”

Seriously, what’s up with this situation? And just how the hell am I going to get out of this freaking game?!

---
I woke up in a strange bed, with not just one, but two lovers beside me! In this game of love, affection, and deception, I’m Elvia, the Imperial Princess, with a gaggle of men vying for my favor. Sounds great, right? Except this means I'm also stuck as the villainess while the main character is my manipulative maid, Arielle! She’s out to bring me down, and she’s got plans for my harem of men. But I know all her secrets, because I can see her player notifications. Can I beat her at her own game?

---
**Original Novel:**
* Chapters: [Boomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/Game_set), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/52298103)
* eBook: [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5370400), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/793012528)
* [Official English Translation](https://radishfiction.com/stories/21138)

**Original Webtoon:**

* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia (R15)](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Terjatuh-ke-Permainan-Harem/191)
* [Japanese / 日本語 (R15)](https://piccoma.com/web/product/54742)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย (R15)](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B7%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B8%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1/133)
description.fr:
Dur, dur de se retrouver coincée dans le corps d’une psychopathe vicieuse haïe de tous! Surtout lorsqu’elle se révèle être la méchante d’un jeu vidéo de drague, destinée à mourir de mort violente. Une seule solution pour survivre: opérer un virage à 180 degrés: remettre de l’ordre dans l’empire, libérer les esclaves de l'ancienne princesse et changer son image auprès de tous. Mais c’est sans compter les ambitions de l’héroïne du jeu, bien décidée à massacrer sa rivale.

---
**Original Novel:**
* Chapters: [Boomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/Game_set), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/52298103)

title.en: Koori no Hime wa Chiisana Hidamari de Tokasaretai

altTitles.ja: 氷の姫は小さな陽だまりでとかされたい

altTitles.en: The Ice Princess Wants to Be Melted by a Small Patch of Sunlight

description.en: Aoba is a first-year high school student who takes care of his younger siblings in place of his busy parents, and ends up at a sibling playdate in the home of his classmate Mizudori, a cool beauty known as the "Ice Princess".
description.ja:
多忙な両親に代わり、保育園児の弟妹を世話する男子高校生の青葉実晴は、恋愛をする暇はないが、弟妹と楽しく過ごしていた。ある日、クラスメートで「氷の姫様」と呼ばれるクール美女・水鳥雪の自宅で遊ぶことになった青葉は、「私を笑顔にしてくれませんか？」と水鳥に頼まれて…！？ 

幼い弟妹を大切に想う高校生たちの青春ラブコメ開幕！

description.en: Kwon Yong-jin, a protagonist who doesn’t believe in superstitions, experiences unbelievable events right after his 16th birthday.

altTitles.ja: 文豪ストレイドッグス

altTitles.en: Stray Dogs of the Literary Masters

description.en: Nakajima Atsushi was kicked out of his orphanage, and now he has no place to go and no food. While he is standing by a river, on the brink of starvation, he rescues a man whimsically attempting suicide. That man is Dazai Osamu, and he and his partner Kunikida are members of a very special detective agency. They have supernatural powers, and deal with cases that are too dangerous for the police or the military. They're tracking down a tiger that has appeared in the area recently, around the time Atsushi came to the area. The tiger seems to have a connection to Atsushi, and by the time the case is solved, it is clear that Atsushi's future will involve much more of Dazai and the rest of the detectives!
description.ru: Нашего героя выгнали из детского дома. Стоя у реки, он думал о голодной смерти, но чудом умудрился спасти самоубийцу. Этот человек, оказалось, состоит в детективном агентстве. В агентстве со сверхъестественными способностями. И только им подвластно решение проблем, за которые боятся браться даже военные. Теперь жизнь нашего героя изменится кардинально. А как именно читайте далее.

description.en: "Tales of Greed" is back with an even deeper story! What if the desires that every human can have become a reality? Will the outcome ultimately lead to happiness or bring about destruction?
description.id: 'Diary of Desire' kini kembali dengan cerita yang lebih deep! Bagaimana jika keinginan yang bisa dimiliki oleh setiap manusia menjadi kenyataan? Apakah akhirnya akan bahagia atau malah membawa kehancuran?
description.ko:
더욱 더 매운맛으로 돌아온 욕망일기의 새로운 에피소드
인간이라면 누구나 가질법한 욕망,
그것이 현실로 이루어진다면?
그 끝은 과연 행복일까 파멸일까..

altTitles.ja: フルメタル・パニック!

description.en: Trouble always seems to follow the beautiful and sassy, Kaname Chidori. Though she is only a high-school student, Kaname is constantly the target of terrorism. Lucky for her though, the dreamy Sosuke, an undercover agent from Mithril, is one step behind her, ready to protect her at any cost. But will he be able to save her from harm every time she is in trouble?
description.es-la: Los problemas siempre parecen perseguir a la bella y atrevida Kaname Chidori. Aunque solo es una estudiante de preparatoria, Kaname es constantemente el blanco del terrorismo. Sin embargo, por suerte para ella, el soñador Sosuke, un agente encubierto de Mithril, está un paso detrás de ella, listo para protegerla a cualquier costo. Pero, ¿podrá salvarla del daño cada vez que esté en problemas?

altTitles.ja: ノー・ガンズ・ライフ

description.en: After the war, there are many "Extends" in the city, people whose bodies were modified to make them into dangerous weapons. Inui Juuzou is one of them, and he has no memories of his life and body before his head was transformed into a gun. Strangely enough, his head-gun is designed so that only someone behind him can pull the trigger. Juuzou makes a living by taking on cases involving Extends in the city, and he is assisted by Mary, an intelligent young woman that he has taken under his protection.
description.uk: Після війни в місті з'явилося багато " Екстендів" - людей, чиї тіла були модифіковані з метою перетворення їх на смертоносну зброю. Джюзо Інуї - один з них, він не має жодних спогадів про своє життя і тіло до того, як його голова перетворилася на пістолет. І як не дивно, але його голова-пістолет влаштована таким чином, що тільки той, хто стоїть позаду нього, може натиснути на спусковий гачок. Джюзо заробляє на життя тим, що займається випадками, пов'язаними з Екстендами по всьому місту, в чому йому допомагає Мері, розумна молода дівчина, котру він взяв під свій захист.
description.pt-br:
Depois da guerra, existiam muitos "Extended" na cidade, que eram pessoas que tiveram os corpos modificados para serem transformados em armas mortais. Inui Juzo é um deles, e ele não possui lembrança alguma da sua vida antes de ter a sua cabeça transformada em uma arma. Estranhamente, a sua arma em formato de revolver é desenhada para que alguém possa puxar o gatilho. Juzo sobrevive solucionando casos envolvendo extended na cidade, e ele é auxiliado pela Mary, uma jovem e inteligente mulher que ele colocou sob a sua proteção.  
  
**Officially Published:**  
- In Italian by [Star Comics](https://www.starcomics.com/titoli-fumetti/no-guns-life)  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/karasuma2828)

title.en: The Legendary Assassin Reincarnated as the Beloved Youngest Daughter of a Royal Family

altTitles.ja: 伝説の暗殺者、転生したら王家の愛され末娘になってしまいまして

altTitles.pt-br: Tire proveito da habilidade do assassino  Proteja sua família, amor.
Um assassino lendário, reencarnou e se tornou a filha mais nova da família real

altTitles.en: The Legendary Assassin Reincarnated as the Beloved Youngest Daughter of a Royal Family.

altTitles.ja-ro: Densetsu no Ansatsusha, Tensei Shitara Ouke no Aisare Suemusume ni Natte Shimaimashite

description.pt-br:
“Babu-babu-babu-babu-babu-babu!?”
 (Estou me transformando em um bebê!?)

 Thoth, um assassino considerado uma lenda no submundo, é vendido por seus pais ainda jovem e criado estritamente como um assassino, por isso não conhece o amor de sua família.  Por capricho, ela salva um gato e morre, mas depois de morrer, está prestes a ser condenada ao inferno por tirar a vida de muitas pessoas.  No entanto, devido à sua boa ação de salvar um gato, ela pode reencarnar e renascer como a princesa do reino, Patricia.  Então, Deus ordena que ele salve os membros da família real – sua família.
 Ele deveria ter renascido como um bebê indefeso, mas suas habilidades de assassino não diminuíram e ele continua a lutar contra assassinos um após o outro.

 Aos poucos, surge o sentimento de querer proteger os membros da família real, que os amam incondicionalmente só porque são da família...?

title.en: Tensei Saki ga Zannen Ouji Datta Ken: Ima wa Fukkin 1-kai mo Dekinai kedo Yasete Isekai Sukuimasu

altTitles.id: Tereinkarnasi sebagai Pangeran yang Mengecewakan: Saat Ini Sit-up Sekali pun Tak Bisa, tapi akan Kucoba 'tuk Diet dan Selamatkan Dunia

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Disappointing Prince
That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Disappointing Prince: Right Now I Can't Even Do One Sit-up, but I'll Try to Lose Weight and Save the World

altTitles.ja: 転生先が残念王子だった件 ～今は腹筋１回もできないけど痩せて異世界救います～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Saki ga Zannen Ouji Datta Ken: Ima wa Fukkin 1-kai mo Dekinai kedo Yasete Isekai Sukuimasu
Tensei Saki ga Zannen Ouji Datta Ken: Ima wa Fukkin Ikkai mo Dekinai kedo Yasete Isekai Sukuimasu

altTitles.en: Reincarnated as a Disappointing Prince～I can't do a single sit-up now, but I'm going to lose weight and save another world～

description.en:
A young man who gets into a plane crash while returning from a business trip overseas is reincarnated into another world after being asked by the goddess to defeat the evil god.   
  
However, he was reincarnated as a stupid prince who is known among the aristocrats as the "Pig Prince (Orc Prince)" because of his fat and ugly appearance. If you can't even do one sit-up, how are you going to defeat the evil god? This is the story of the Pig Prince's struggle to lose weight!  
  


---
description.id:
Seorang pemuda yang mengalami kecelakaan pesawat saat pulang dari perjalan binis di luar negeri direinkarnasi ke dunia lain setelah diminta oleh dewi untuk mengalahkan dewa jahat.   
  
Akan tetapi, ia tereinkarnasi sebagai seorang pangeran bodoh. yang terkenal di kalangan ningrat dengan julukan "Pangeran Orc/Pangeran Babi" karena penampilannya yang gendut dan jelek. Sit-up saja tidak bisa, apalagi mengalahkan dewa jahat? Inilah kisah perjuangan si Pangeran Babi dalam menurunkan berat badan!

altTitles.ja: マオ

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

Yi-jae transmigrated as Hailey, the daughter of the Duke, who threw herself in the water just before her royal wedding.

However, Yi-jae can see vengeful spirits that should not be visible behind the King!
Days continue as Yi-jae struggles to exorcise the vengeful spirits that flock around King Roderick.

As Roderick spends more time with Yi-jae, he starts to notice the odd changes in his mental and physical self as they clear…

altTitles.ja: 音盤紀行

description.en: The secret of the record left by my grandfather, the underground record shop dealing with forbidden pop music, and the old jukebox in the diner of the near future. A collection of short stories that traces the memories and feelings contained in the records.
description.ja: 祖父の遺したレコードの秘密、禁制のポップ音楽を扱う地下レコード店、近未来のダイナーにおかれた古びたジュークボックス。レコードに込められた記憶と想いを辿る短篇集。

description.en:
Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)
description.pt-br: Bai Lijin, uma fada que vivia no céu, comendo e bebendo sem se preocupar, quebrou o colorido vitral de Sua Majestade em seu aniversário e foi banida para o reino mortal. Agora ela tem que começar suas aventuras no reino mortal sem todos os seus poderes espirituais! Para sobreviver, a ex-fada tem que entregar comida… Uma fada carinhosamente boba, uma gentil gerente de restaurante, uma aluna reservada e uma garota de duas caras difícil de resistir, que comece a história de sua bela amizade e juventude!

altTitles.ja: ゆれる早春

description.en: Sakioka Junko stands out among her peers with her attractive appearance and that annoys the other girls. Kasai Makoto, tired of hearing whining from the girls, offers to quarrel with Junko's best and, for obvious reasons, only friend. The enemy is defeated and goes into sobbing, but suddenly, Kasai, who really did not want to harm the girl, wants to console her… (MangaUpdates)

A god created AOTU World and established the 7 Oracles to rule it on behalf of this god. The poor and rich, enslaved and free, suffering and happiness, destruction and birth: every status is ordained by God. Mortals can only accept, but cannot resist. However, God has given his people the opportunity to change their fate through "AOTU Contest." The contestants use their unique "ability" gifted by the Contest System and inbate wisdom and courage in hopes of winning the competition and becoming the world's ruler.
description.vi:
Thần Sáng Thế của thế giới Ao Đột là một vị thần rất ngẫu hứng.
Ngài tạo ra vô số hành tinh và con dân trong thế giới Ao Đột, nhưng lại cai quản họ một cách tùy ý không theo quy luật --- có hành tinh màu mỡ tươi đẹp, có hành tinh cằn cỗi hoang vu, có con dân được hưởng tự do hạnh phúc, có con dân lại phải chịu sưu thuế nặng nề và lao động khổ sai.
Thần Sáng Thế thành lập ra Bảy Thần Sử, để họ thay mình thực hiện ý chỉ của thần
Thế nhưng cũng không phải là Thần Sáng Thế hoàn toàn không cho con dân mình cơ hội --- nếu như ai muốn thay đổi vận mệnh, thực hiện nguyện vọng của bản thân, vậy thì hãy tham gia "Đại chiến Ao Đột" đi! Các thí sinh sẽ được hệ thống đại chiến ban cho "năng lực đặc biệt", rèn luyện và vận dụng năng lực của riêng mình, không ngừng chiến đấu vượt qua thử thách. Chỉ cần là người chiến thắng sau cùng trong đại chiến Ao Đột là có thể đạt được tất cả, đồng thời được ban cho quyền thay mặt thần cai trị thế giới giống như Bảy Thần Sử.
Tuy nhiên, những điều trên chỉ là quan niệm giả dối, cuộc đấu này đã định sẵn không hề có kẻ chiến thắng. Cho tới khi nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Kim, xuất hiện trên sân đấu.

altTitles.ja: さんかくフレネミーズ

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

altTitles.ja: 支配少女くばるちゃん

description.en:
After fierce bullying, Yuuto Kiba wanted to die. On the verge of committing suicide, his fate changes rapidly when a strange and funky beautiful girl, Kubaru, tells him, “Give me your life”.

Make your life happy with love?! A slightly strange and psycho love drama.
description.ja:
熾烈ないじめの末に、もう死にたいと思っていた少年・木場優人（きばゆうと）。自殺する寸前に、奇妙なファンキー美少女・くばるに「君の人生を頂戴」と言われたことで、運命が目まぐるしく変わっていく。

ラブで君の人生を幸せにする？！ちょっと奇妙でサイコなラブドラマ。
